manifest.title: Castopod
manifest.author: Benjamin Bellamy / Yassine Doghrii
manifest.description:
## About

Castopod is a free and open-source podcast hosting solution made for podcasters who want engage and interact with their audience.

Self-host your podcasts with ease, keep control over what you create and talk to your audience without any middleman. Your podcast and your audience belong to you and you only.

## Features

* Talk to your audience, directly - Interact with your audience in the fediverse, a decentralized social network.
* Promote your podcast - Castopod helps you get noticed by enforcing best practices and by giving you tools to post easily on all social media.
* Your podcast, everywhere - Manage your podcast in one place, broadcast it everywhere using RSS.
* Built-in analytics - Get all the insights of your podcasts and episodes
* Value your work - Publish your podcast for free or monetize it
* Free & open-source
